summary: Exactly what it says, Skyrim with no guards.
descriptionHtml:
This mod has been updated to version 2.0 please follow the instructions at the bottom of the page to update. :) 
Version 2.0 completely removes guards.

PLEASE BE AWARE THAT AS OF VERSION 2.0 FOR ANY QUESTS THAT REQUIRE GUARDS YOU WILL NEED TO DEACTIVATE THIS MOD UNTIL THE QUEST HAS BEEN COMPLETED AND THEN YOU CAN REACTIVATE THE MOD.

Steam Version:    http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=173904305

PLEASE ENDORSE THIS MOD IF YOU DOWNLOAD/LIKE IT!!!!! :)

Lawless, is a small mod created by me to remove ALL of the guards in Skyrim. Hope you enjoy this mod, do not upload this file elsewhere without my permission. Constructive criticism welcome. Any bugs please report to me on the forums section.

If you would like me to try and make another mod and want to suggest an idea please comment on the forums section!

Manual Download:
Download the .rar file from the files section.
Extract it with either \'WINRAR\' or another program.
Put the file named \'Lawless-skyrimwithnoguards\' into your Skyrim-Data Folder.
Make a new save.
Exit The Game.
Reload The Game.
Enjoy!! :)


How To Update the mod:

Go into your skyrim-data folder.
Remove the \'Lawless-skyrimwithnoguards\' file
then reinstall with either NMM or manually (instructions above)
Go into skyrim
Save the Game 
Quit to Desktop
Load the save.
Enjoy. :)
author: TiNyTeRRoR180
